critique: The document expresses concern about crime rates and outlines a plan to reduce crime and recidivism. It aims to convey a sense of responsibility and determination to improve public safety. The emotions that the public is expected to feel are primarily concern (due to the discussion of crime rates) and hope (due to the proposed solutions). There might also be a slight sense of surprise at the statistics presented. Disgust, fear, joy, and sadness are less prominent.
